sentence.Network_en: The synthesis methods of magnesia - alumina spinel are electro - fusion and sintering process.
sentence.Network_cn: 镁铝尖晶石的合成方法有电熔法和烧结法.

sentence.Network_en: Spinel containing refractories are widely used in metallurgical industry.
sentence.Network_cn: 含尖晶石的耐火材料广泛应用于冶金行业.

sentence.Network_en: The mechanics properties and microstructure of self - flow alumina - spinel castable have been investigated.
sentence.Network_cn: 研究了氧化铝 - 尖晶石质自流浇注料的力争性能和显微结构.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from French spinelle, from Italian spinella, diminutive of spina 'thorn'

means.word_mean: 1. a hard glassy mineral consisting of an oxide of magnesium and aluminum; occurs in various colors that are used as gemstones
